snippet: Mr. Stewart was a television producer with a penchant for transforming the seemingly mundane into blockbuster shows like “The Price Is Right” and “To Tell the Truth.”
abstract: Bob Stewart, television producer and game-show inventor who created the long-running hits The Price is Right and To Tell the Truth, dies at age 91.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Stewart was a television producer with a penchant for transforming the seemingly mundane into blockbuster shows like “The Price Is Right” and “To Tell the Truth.”

headline.seo: Bob Stewart, Inventor of Game Shows, Is Dead at 91
headline.main: Bob Stewart, Inventor of Game Shows, Is Dead at 91
headline.print_headline: Bob Stewart, Inventor of Game Shows, Is Dead at 91
